summary: A talented all-black high school basketball team challenges the top all-white team in civil-rights-era New Orleans.
cast: Andre Braugher|Rip Torn|Sean Squire|Ruby Dee|Bill Nunn|Daniel Hugh Kelly|Tony Colitti|Anderson Bourell|Khalil Kain|Tony Bond|Khaz Benyahmeen|Darris Love|Elimu Nelson|Damien Dante Wayans|Brett Rice|John Lawhorn|Shawn Wright|Tom Turbiville|Frank Hoyt Taylor|Angela Elayne Gibbs|Arthur Agee|Bill Ewin|Thomas Jefferson Byrd|Sharon Blackwood|Albert B. Cooper IV|Rodney A. Copeland|Stacie Richards Dail|Sandra Dorsey|Teena Flowers|Vonetta Flowers|Seth Hendricks|Vonetta Flowers Hinton|Patrice Jackson|Kyle Massey|Sahr Ngaujah|Ric Reitz|Shawn Shepard|Amber Brooke|Deanna Dawn|Missy Hayduk|Robert Owen|Kenon Walker
title: Un pase a la gloria
